title: How to Draw a Heart Eyes Emoji

steps.headline: Gather your materials.
steps.description: You will need paper, a pencil, a red marker, a yellow marker, and an orange marker.

steps.headline: Draw a circle.
steps.description: Draw round a circular object if necessary.

steps.headline: Draw two hearts near the top of the circle.
Draw a U-shape and connect the top of the U-shape to each other in a line slightly titled down.
Fill in the face with a yellow marker.
Fill in the two hearts with red marker.
Fill in the mouth with the orange marker.
Color in the extra spots that were missed.
Outline a circle with a black marker.

text: Planning and Drawing it Out Gather your materials. You will need paper, a pencil, a red marker, a yellow marker, and an orange marker. Draw a circle. Draw round a circular object if necessary. Draw two hearts near the top of the circle.  Draw a U-shape and connect the top of the U-shape to each other in a line slightly titled down.  Remove any unnecessary pencil marks.  Coloring the Emoji Fill in the face with a yellow marker.  Fill in the two hearts with red marker.  Fill in the mouth with the orange marker.  Color in the extra spots that were missed.  Outlining the Emoji Outline a circle with a black marker.  Outline both of the hearts.  Outline the mouth.
